headline: Risk Assets Rally on Fed Optimism

sections.the_day: Crypto markets posted a robust session with Bitcoin surging past $91k and Ethereum breaking decisively through $3k. Trading volumes were elevated but not exceptional. The rally synchronized with equity markets, particularly tech, in what became a broad-based risk-on day. No crypto-specific catalysts emerged; this was pure sentiment.
sections.the_move_explained: Markets are pricing in a more dovish Fed trajectory following softer-than-expected economic data. The correlation trade remains firmly intact—crypto moved in lockstep with Nasdaq futures. When macro uncertainty recedes, speculative assets get their bid back.
sections.into_tonight: Asian markets will set the tone for whether this momentum sustains or fades into profit-taking. Watch for any Fed speaker commentary that could either validate or challenge today's repricing.
